result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.html: Ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ponchtml: Ar ċúis éigin ḃí eagla orm roiṁ na madraí marḃa cé naċ raiḃ cor astuFor some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.

result.html: Dhein na madraí drannadhThe dogs snarled
result.ponchtml: Ḋein na madraí drannaḋThe dogs snarled

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
